attributes.action: We want Parliament to scrap the new immigration system and restore our FOM
attributes.additional_details:
Travelling to the EU and EEA will probably become more expensive, the cost of travel insurance will probably increase due to the need to cover medical insurance.  For some travelling to Europe may well become completely unviable.

The Government has removed our right to live, work, study, fall in loveand retire freely in the EU and EEA cliaming this to be a success.  It's not.  Its a disaster
attributes.background: This week the new immigration bill passed parliament and became law. The Tories claim this ends Freedom of Movement.  It doesn't FOM will continue across the EU and EEA.  The only people losing their Freedom of movement is us.  Future generations will be affected by this.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556757
